title: WATCH:  Horse roams supermarket aisles
description: An unattended horse was seen wandering the aisles of a supermarket in Cardiff, Wales, leaving some in “disbelief," and it was not immediately known where the horse came from.

title: New Jersey park decoration fell from damaged rope, hurt 4
description: State investigators say a damaged rope led to the plunge of a decorative helicopter into a swimming pool at a New Jersey water park last weekend, injuring four people

title: More than 126,000 without power in California amid rain, heavy snow, damaging winds
description: Major storm leaves more than 126,000 without power in California amid record rainfall, heavy snow and damaging winds. The storm will move across the entire country.

title: Small planes crashes into icy harbor, killing Minnesota man
description: Authorities say a Minnesota man was killed when the small aircraft he was piloting crashed on the ice of a harbor

title: At least 2 dead, 11 injured after pickup truck crashes into group of cyclists
description: At least two cyclists are dead and 11 others injured after a pickup truck crashed into a large group of cyclists in Arizona Saturday morning, police said.

title: DA drops felony charge against officer in train crash case
description: Colorado cop locked a woman in a police car that was hit by a freight train.

title: Mass protests in Israel as controversial overhauls advanced
description: New bill allows Supreme Court decision to be overturned with a simple majority.

title: Thousands join Berlin rally calling for Ukraine peace talks
description: They condemned Germany supplying arms to Ukraine, call for end to the war.

title: Irish leader: Brexit talks over N Ireland close to a deal
description: Ireland's prime minister says U.K. and E.U. are “inching” closer to agreeing.

title: 2 arrested in Ga. gas station shooting that injured 9 kids
description: Two people, one just 15 years old, arrested in connection with the shooting.

title: 3 wounded after reception to mourn teen slain at school
description: A 15-year-old was fatally stabbed at his St. Paul high school earlier this month

title: Man gets life in prison for killing Navy midshipman's mother
description: A Maryland man convicted of fatally shooting the mother of a U.S. Naval Academy football player with a stray bullet has been sentenced to life in prison without the possibility of parole

title: WATCH:  2 pups make great escape
description: A Husky and a smaller dog manage to play the escape game with a little help from each other.

title: Some Democratic-led states seek to bolster voter protections
description: Lawmakers in several Democratic-controlled states are advocating sweeping voter protections

title: Justice Thomas wrote of 'crushing weight' of student loans
description: The Supreme Court won’t have far to look for a personal take on the “crushing weight” of student debt that underlies the Biden administration’s college loan forgiveness plan

title: Slovak movie director Juraj Jakubisko dies at 84
description: Slovak filmmaker Juraj Jakubisko, who was named the best movie director of the 20th century in his country, has died

title: 5 dead, including patient and medical personnel, in Care Flight plane crash
description: Five people are dead, including a patient and medical personnel, after a Care Flight plane crashed late Friday in Nevada.

title: Biden tells ABC's Muir 'we would respond' if China sends weapons to Russia
description: He warned of sanctions on China if it gives lethal assistance to Russia in its invasion of Ukraine.

title: Nigeria presidential election 2023: Why this vote is 'consequential'
description: Nigeria's 2023 presidential election is widely seen as a potential turning point for Africa's most populous country, largest democracy and biggest economy.

title: Warner Bros. Discovery sues Paramount over 'South Park' deal
description: The lawsuit alleges the competitor aired new episodes of the animated series after Warner paid for exclusive rights.

title: New Mexico governor pans Forest Service amid wild cow fight
description: New Mexico's governor has stepped into the fight over how federal land managers are eradicating wild cows in the Gila Wilderness

title: Brockovich warns Ohio town of dangers after train crash
description: Residents of East Palestine, Ohio, say they are still fearful as activist Erin Brockovich warns they are in for a long battle after a train derailment earlier this month

title: Body of 1 Washington state avalanche victim recovered
description: Authorities say the body of one of the three climbers killed in an avalanche on Washington state’s Colchuck Peak last weekend has been recovered

title: FDA authorizes combination flu-COVID test for home use
description: The Food and Drug Administration has approved the first combination test for flu and COVID-19 that can be used at home, giving consumers an easy way to determine if a runny nose is caused by either disease

title: WATCH:  World landmarks glow blue and yellow in solidarity with Ukraine
description: The Empire State Building in New York City, the Eiffel Tower in France and the Sydney Opera House in Australia were lit up in the colors of the Ukrainian flag as the conflict marks one year.

title: Feds seek to limit telehealth prescriptions for some drugs
description: The Biden administration is moving to require patients see a doctor in person before getting drugs to treat attention deficit disorders or addictive painkillers, toughening access amid a deepening opioid crisis

title: WATCH:  Polar bears frolic in snow at Oregon Zoo
description: A couple polar bears at the Oregon Zoo enjoyed the snowy conditions from a recent winter storm, playing around in the fresh snowfall.

title: After Michigan storm, customers wait - and wait - for power
description: Frustration and anger are mounting among some Michigan utility customers who are still waiting for power to be restored after a massive ice storm this week damaged electricity lines

title: 'My intention is ... to run,' Biden tells ABC's Muir on reelection decision
description: The president spoke in an exclusive interview with ABC News Friday at the White House.

title: California serial killer suspected of slaying cellmate
description: Authorities say a convicted serial killer is suspected of slaying his new cellmate at a central California prison

title: Historic Bush-era HIV/AIDS initiative celebrates 20th anniversary
description: Since PEPFAR's inception, the program has saved more than 25 million lives.

title: WATCH:  Watch the master of 'Simon Says,' who's going viral for his skills
description: Steve Max, known as the master of the kid's game 'Simon Says,' is going viral on TikTok for his incredible halftime performances with fans playing the game.

title: Elderly man killed, woman critically injured in 'horrific' dog attack
description: An elderly man was killed and a woman critically injured in a "horrific" dog attack in Texas on Friday, authorities said.
